name: OrderApi_CreateDeliveryNote
description: Create an delivery note for an existing order. This request is extra throttled by order and api key to a maximum of 1 per 5 minutes.

id.description: The internal billbee id of the order

includePdf.description: If true, the PDF is included in the response as base64 encoded string

sendToCloudId.description: Optionally specify the id of a billbee connected cloud device to send the pdf to
